questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I would like to be a rich woman with a very good job. I would have a beautiful house with a pool and a big garden. I would make a lot of travel in the world with my family and my friends and also humanitary travels for the children without family. I would work in a company who respects people and help the more poors. For me it's important to work for make a better world. And I would live with the woman that I love. And 2 cats.
